mapper.insert: insert into tbl_message (sender_id, receiver_id, message_content, message_room_id) values (#{senderId}, #{receiverId}, #{messageContent}, #{messageRoomId})
mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.sender_id, m.receiver_id, m.message_status, m.notification_datetime, m.message_content, m.message_room_id FROM tbl_message m WHERE m.message_room_id = #{messageRoomId} ORDER BY m.notification_datetime
SELECT m.id, m.sender_id, m.receiver_id, m.message_status, m.notification_datetime, m.message_content, m.message_room_id FROM tbl_message m WHERE m.id = #{id}
